oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Morning Moods - Audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition for WSM program Morning Moods, featuring Tommy Sosebee, the Anita Kerr Singers, and Owen Bradley and the Vel-Tones, with announcer Dave Overton. Sponsored by Colgate-Palmolive-Peet products Ajax, Vel, and Veto. See also TR001333.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tommy Sosebee; Anita Kerr Singers; Anita Kerr; Owen Bradley; Vel-Tones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Vel jingle -- Ajax jingle -- Veto jingle -- Opening statement (Dave Overton) -- Theme (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Stay A Little Longer (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr Singers) -- Opening statement (Tommy Sosebee) -- Ajax jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Ajax commercial (Dave Overton) -- Ajax jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Limehouse Blues (Owen Bradley and the Vel-Tones) -- Cast talk -- Vel jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Vel commercial (Dave Overton, Anita Kerr) -- Vel jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Tommy Sosebee and Anita Kerr talk -- Have I Told You Lately That I Love You? (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr) -- Veto jingle (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr) -- Veto commercial (Dave Overton) -- Veto jingle (Tommy Sosebee, Anita Kerr) -- A Petal From A Faded Rose (Tommy Sosebee) -- Vel jingle -- Ajax jingle -- Veto jingle -- Closing statement (Tommy Sosebee) -- Theme (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Closing statement (Dave Overton)
